Title: The Wing or The Thigh?
Writer: Claude Zidi (scenario and dialogue), Michel Fabre (collaboration)
Actors: Louis de Funès, Coluche, Ann Zacharias, Julien Guiomar
Plot: Charles Duchemin, a well-known gourmet and the publisher of a famous restaurant guide, is waging a war against fast-food entrepreneur Tri-Catel to save the French art of cooking. After ...
